description: Obtains details about the terms in an agreement that you participated in as proposer or acceptor. The details include:

parameters.name: agreementId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the agreement.

nested_items.name: acceptedTerms
nested_items.description: A subset of terms proposed by the proposer that have been accepted by the acceptor as part of the agreement creation.

nested_items.name: byolPricingTerm
nested_items.description: Enables you and your customers to move your existing agreements to AWS Marketplace. The customer won't be charged for product usage in AWS Marketplace because they already paid for the product outside of AWS Marketplace.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Type of the term being updated.

nested_items.name: configurableUpfrontPricingTerm
nested_items.description: Defines a prepaid payment model that allows buyers to configure the entitlements they want to purchase and the duration.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: Additional parameters specified by the acceptor while accepting the term.

nested_items.name: dimensions
nested_items.description: Defines the dimensions that the acceptor has purchased from the overall set of dimensions presented in the rate card.

nested_items.name: dimensionKey
nested_items.description: The name of key value of the dimension.

nested_items.name: dimensionValue
nested_items.description: The number of units of the dimension the acceptor has purchased.

nested_items.name: selectorValue
nested_items.description: Defines the length of time for which the particular pricing/dimension is being purchased by the acceptor.

nested_items.name: currencyCode
nested_items.description: Defines the currency for the prices mentioned in the term.

nested_items.name: rateCards
nested_items.description: A rate card defines the per unit rates for product dimensions.

nested_items.name: constraints
nested_items.description: Defines limits on how the term can be configured by acceptors.

nested_items.name: multipleDimensionSelection
nested_items.description: Determines if buyers are allowed to select multiple dimensions in the rate card. The possible values are Allowed and Disallowed. The default value is Allowed.

nested_items.name: quantityConfiguration
nested_items.description: Determines if acceptors are allowed to configure quantity for each dimension in rate card. The possible values are Allowed and Disallowed. The default value is Allowed.

nested_items.name: rateCard
nested_items.description: Defines the per unit rates for product dimensions.

nested_items.name: dimensionKey
nested_items.description: Dimension for which the given entitlement applies. Dimensions represent categories of capacity in a product and are specified when the product is listed in AWS Marketplace.

nested_items.name: price
nested_items.description: Per unit price for the product dimension that's used for calculating the amount to be charged.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Category of selector.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: Contract duration. This field supports the ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Category of selector.

nested_items.name: fixedUpfrontPricingTerm
nested_items.description: Defines a pre-paid pricing model where the customers are charged a fixed upfront amount.

nested_items.name: currencyCode
nested_items.description: Defines the currency for the prices mentioned in this term.

nested_items.name: duration
nested_items.description: Contract duration for the terms.

nested_items.name: grants
nested_items.description: Entitlements granted to the acceptor of fixed upfront as part of agreement execution.

nested_items.name: dimensionKey
nested_items.description: Unique dimension key defined in the product document. Dimensions represent categories of capacity in a product and are specified when the product is listed in AWS Marketplace.

nested_items.name: maxQuantity
nested_items.description: Maximum amount of capacity that the buyer can be entitled to the given dimension of the product. If MaxQuantity is not provided, the buyer will be able to use an unlimited amount of the given dimension.

nested_items.name: price
nested_items.description: Fixed amount to be charged to the customer when this term is accepted.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Category of the term being updated.

nested_items.name: freeTrialPricingTerm
nested_items.description: Defines a short-term free pricing model where the buyers aren't charged anything within a specified limit.

nested_items.name: duration
nested_items.description: Duration of the free trial period (5---31 days).

nested_items.name: grants
nested_items.description: Entitlements granted to the acceptor of a free trial as part of an agreement execution.

nested_items.name: dimensionKey
nested_items.description: Unique dimension key defined in the product document. Dimensions represent categories of capacity in a product and are specified when the product is listed in AWS Marketplace.

nested_items.name: maxQuantity
nested_items.description: Maximum amount of capacity that the buyer can be entitled to the given dimension of the product. If MaxQuantity is not provided, the buyer will be able to use an unlimited amount of the given dimension.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Category of the term.

nested_items.name: legalTerm
nested_items.description: Defines the list of text agreements proposed to the acceptors. An example is the end user license agreement (EULA).

nested_items.name: documents
nested_items.description: List of references to legal resources proposed to the buyers. An example is the EULA.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Category of the document. Document types include:
CustomEula --- A custom EULA provided by you as seller. A URL for a EULA stored in an accessible Amazon S3 bucket is required for this document type.
CustomDsa --- A custom Data Subscription Agreement (DSA) provided by you as seller. A URL for a DSA stored in an accessible Amazon S3 bucket is required for this document type.

StandardEula --- The Standard Contract for AWS Marketplace (SCMP). For more information about SCMP, see the AWS Marketplace Seller Guide. You don't provide a URL for this type because it's managed by AWS Marketplace.
StandardDsa --- DSA for AWS Marketplace. For more information about the DSA, see the AWS Data Exchange User Guide. You don't provide a URL for this type because it's managed by AWS Marketplace.

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: A URL to the legal document for buyers to read. Required when Type is CustomEula.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: Version of standard contracts provided by AWS Marketplace. Required when Type is StandardEula or StandardDsa.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Category of the term being updated.

nested_items.name: paymentScheduleTerm
nested_items.description: Defines an installment-based pricing model where customers are charged a fixed price on different dates during the agreement validity period. This is used most commonly for flexible payment schedule pricing.

nested_items.name: currencyCode
nested_items.description: Defines the currency for the prices mentioned in the term.

nested_items.name: schedule
nested_items.description: List of the payment schedule where each element defines one installment of payment. It contains the information necessary for calculating the price.

nested_items.name: chargeAmount
nested_items.description: The price that the customer would pay on the scheduled date (chargeDate).

nested_items.name: chargeDate
nested_items.description: The date that the customer would pay the price defined in this payment schedule term. Invoices are generated on the date provided.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Type of the term.

nested_items.name: recurringPaymentTerm
nested_items.description: Defines a pricing model where customers are charged a fixed recurring price at the end of each billing period.

nested_items.name: billingPeriod
nested_items.description: Defines the recurrence at which buyers are charged.

nested_items.name: currencyCode
nested_items.description: Defines the currency for the prices mentioned in this term.

nested_items.name: price
nested_items.description: Amount charged to the buyer every billing period.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Type of the term being updated.

nested_items.name: renewalTerm
nested_items.description: Defines that on graceful expiration of the agreement (when the agreement ends on its pre-defined end date), a new agreement will be created using the accepted terms on the existing agreement. In other words, the agreement will be renewed. Presence of RenewalTerm in the offer document means that auto-renewal is allowed. Buyers will have the option to accept or decline auto-renewal at the offer acceptance/agreement creation. Buyers can also change this flag from True to False or False to True at anytime during the agreement's lifecycle.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: Additional parameters specified by the acceptor while accepting the term.

nested_items.name: enableAutoRenew
nested_items.description: Defines whether the acceptor has chosen to auto-renew the agreement at the end of its lifecycle. Can be set to True or False.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Category of the term being updated.

nested_items.name: supportTerm
nested_items.description: Defines the customer support available for the acceptors when they purchase the software.

nested_items.name: refundPolicy
nested_items.description: Free-text field about the refund policy description that will be shown to customers as is on the website and console.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Category of the term being updated.

nested_items.name: usageBasedPricingTerm
nested_items.description: Defines a usage-based pricing model (typically, pay-as-you-go pricing), where the customers are charged based on product usage.

nested_items.name: currencyCode
nested_items.description: Defines the currency for the prices mentioned in the term.

nested_items.name: rateCards
nested_items.description: List of rate cards.

nested_items.name: rateCard
nested_items.description: Defines the per unit rates for product dimensions.

nested_items.name: dimensionKey
nested_items.description: Dimension for which the given entitlement applies. Dimensions represent categories of capacity in a product and are specified when the product is listed in AWS Marketplace.

nested_items.name: price
nested_items.description: Per unit price for the product dimension that's used for calculating the amount to be charged.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Category of the term.

nested_items.name: validityTerm
nested_items.description: Defines the conditions that will keep an agreement created from this offer valid.

nested_items.name: agreementDuration
nested_items.description: Defines the duration that the agreement remains active. If AgreementStartDate isn't provided, the agreement duration is relative to the agreement signature time. The duration is represented in the ISO_8601 format.

nested_items.name: agreementEndDate
nested_items.description: Defines the date when the agreement ends. The agreement ends at 23:59:59.999 UTC on the date provided. If AgreementEndDate isn't provided, the agreement end date is determined by the validity of individual terms.

nested_items.name: agreementStartDate
nested_items.description: Defines the date when agreement starts. The agreement starts at 00:00:00.000 UTC on the date provided. If AgreementStartDate isn't provided, the agreement start date is determined based on agreement signature time.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Category of the term being updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token to specify where to start pagination.
